en.end-message: Magnetic Master! You've conquered all the challenges and completed 'Magnetic Mayhem.' Your magnetic genius has guided the roller coaster through electrifying adventures. Thanks for exploring the power of magnets with us. Stay tuned for more magnetic mysteries!
en.general-tutorial-message-pickup-magnet-m: Click on the magnets in your inventory to drag them.
en.general-tutorial-message-place-magnet-me: Drop the magnets in one of the orange slots.
en.general-tutorial-message-observe-message: Watch as the magnets work their magic! The roller coaster should now deviate from its original path, bypassing the red obstacle. Keep an eye on the roller coaster's speed and the joy of its passengers. That's how you'll earn a high score
en.general-tutorial-message-experiment-mess: Feel free to experiment with different magnet placements. You can switch the magnets or even try placing them in different positions to see how it affects the roller coaster's path and speed.
en.general-tutorial-message-level-complete-: Once your roller coaster safely reaches the ending station, you've completed the level! Celebrate your success and get ready for more magnetic adventures in the upcoming levels.
en.general-tutorial-message-passengers-safe: For your passengers safety, you can only start the train when the journey you've created for it ends near the destination station. If your path is not safe the line that shows you the path will become red. And if it is ok, the line becomes white.
en.general-tutorial-message-obstacle-hit-me: If your train is rushing to an obstacle, Don't worry, The obstacle can't hurt your train. It only slows the train down and your train can resume it's path if it has not been nearly stopped.
en.general-tutorial-message-pick-magnet-aga: If you've placed a magnet in a slot and want to pick it up again, there is no problem, just hover the mouse on the magnet and then click on it.
en.general-tutorial-message-drop-magnet-mes: While you are dragging a magnet, if you decide to return the magnet to your inventory, you can do it by right-click with your mouse.
en.general-tutorial-change-view-message: You can use keyboard's left and right arrows to see the area from different places
en.level-1-tutorial-message-1-message: Hey there, future magnet master! I'm Professor Magno. Welcome to "Magnetic Mayhem," where we're going to have a blast while learning about the magical world of magnets.
en.level-1-tutorial-message-2-message: In this game, you'll dive into the fascinating realms of magnetic and electric fields. You'll control a wooden roller coaster with an iron ball at the front, and your mission is to navigate it safely through a variety of obstacles by using magnets.
en.level-1-tutorial-message-3-message: The roller coaster moves along a straight path from the starting station to the ending station, but there's a twist – there's no fixed track! You can steer it in different directions using magnets.
en.level-1-tutorial-message-4-message: Your job is to make sure the roller coaster avoids obstacles and maintains a high speed to keep its passengers joyful. Your score depends on the final speed and the happiness of your roller coaster riders.
en.level-1-tutorial-message-5-message:
Let's jump right in! In this level, you'll find: 
1. One red obstacle blocking the roller coaster's path.
2. Two slots flashing like bright orange circles.
3. In your inventory, there are 2 Strong bar magnets
en.level-1-tutorial-message-6-message: Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to use these magnets wisely to steer the roller coaster safely around the red obstacle.
en.level-1-tutorial-message-7-message: For your ease. I've put a handbook about how things work here. you can access it anytime by clicking on the "Info" button. The one  that has an "i" on it.
en.level-1-tutorial-message-8-message: Remember, you're not just playing a game; you're learning about the incredible power of magnets and how they influence electric forces. So, have fun, experiment, and get ready to become a magnetic genius! Good luck, young scientist!
en.level-2-tutorial-message-1-message: I couldn't be prouder of your accomplishments so far. You've just conquered Level 1 with flying colors, and now, it's time to dive into Level 2 of "Magnetic Mayhem." Get ready for an even more electrifying challenge!
en.level-2-tutorial-message-2-message: In this level, we're cranking up the excitement! You'll face three obstacles blocking the roller coaster's path, and your inventory is stocked with magnets of different poles and powers. It's time to demonstrate your magnetic prowess and navigate your roller coaster to victory!
en.level-3-tutorial-message-1-message: Welcome back, magnetic maestro! You've already shown incredible skills in Levels 1 and 2. Now, get ready for Level 3 in "Magnetic Mayhem." You're in for an electrifying challenge!
en.level-3-tutorial-message-2-message: Level 3 introduces a mind-bending twist to the game! You'll face three obstacles blocking the roller coaster's path. However, this time, the iron ball in front of the roller coaster has been replaced with a particle charged with positive electrical charge.
en.level-3-tutorial-message-3-message: That means any particles that been charged with positive electrical charge will push the roller coaster, and any negative particles that been charged with positive electrical charge will push it..  Let's dive in!
en.level-4-tutorial-message-1-message: Welcome back, magnelectric genius! Professor Magno here, and you've been absolutely crushing it in the previous levels of "Magnetic Mayhem." Now, let's dive into Level 4, where things are about to get even more interesting!
en.level-4-tutorial-message-2-message: But before we get to the new challenge, let's celebrate your accomplishments in Level 3. Navigating that roller coaster with both positive and negative charged particles was a real feat, and you did it with style!
en.level-4-tutorial-message-3-message: Now, let's talk about Level 4. This level has a unique twist – there are only two obstacles, but there's more than one way to pass them.
en.level-4-tutorial-message-4-message: Your creativity and magnet mastery will shine here. You'll have the freedom to choose your path and strategize to earn the highest score possible.
en.level-4-tutorial-message-5-message: Intriguingly, for this level, you'll have a different set of challenges. You will only have positive charged particles in your inventory.
en.level-4-tutorial-message-6-message: Get ready to unleash your magnetic creativity and have a blast exploring different strategies in this electrifying level. You're on your way to becoming a true magnelectric mastermind.
